website_summaries.verdict: It has some nice features, but if you prefer certain types of wine and glasses, it may not be practical for you.
pros: Convenient serving top, glass hanger, and space for 24 bottles
Construction feels stable, even when packed w/bottles and glasses
cons: Some larger wine bottles and glasses with wide bases don't fit
Consumes more floor space than others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. This item was nicer than I expected. It is easy to assemble (did it myself). It is sturdy and looks great. 6 months later the top cracked - just split apart. Be wary.
customer_reviews.author: SBUXLover

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Wine rack today, But when i opened the box only the wood pieces were included and I am missing all the screws, wood plugs and the hex wrench that was suppose to be included as well. Without screws, I obviously have no way of assembling this rack. Now i have to Fax a Parts Request form that was included in the box, this must happen often if this form was in the box. There is also no contact number anywhere in the documentation to speak to someone from the company. The documentation say it can take 7-14 days for delivery. of missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Qu13tst0rM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the assembly after reading other reviews. I have to say that this was one of the easiest pieces of furniture I have ever built (and I have built a lot!). I was also worried about my larger wine glasses not fitting. They didn't at first, however, all I had to do was move two of the slats by just 1/4" and drilled new holes. The entire project took about 20 minutes, and that's even with customizing the glass rack! For the price this is a beautiful wine rack.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Philip

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality pressboard wine rack
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, but fairly simple to figure out by looking at a picture of the finished product. Take care when assembling - do not overtighten the screws. The top shelf was a bit uneven, color wise, but easily concealed. The hanging glass rack is functional, but not very smooth. My cheap large wine glasses are a bit larger than ideal for this track, but they fit ok. The wine rack itself is simple, but fully functional. This rack is inexpensive, but functional. For the price, I have no major complaints. It is a simple, high capacity, inexpensive wine rack. If that's what you need, this certainly fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Kilvari

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy..! (Espresso)
customer_reviews.text: Pro: It is stylish, and easily marches most home décor. Wine Rack easily stores 24 - 1 liter wine bottles we have 2 larger bottle on the bottom rack with no issue. we have 12 wine glasses a it can hold at lease another 12. It has plenty of space on the top if you want to place an ice bucket or mix a couple or=f drinks. Yu can also place non wine glasses on top Sturdy solid wood in espresso finish. Assembly was simple. Con: If you need to hold more than 24 bottles this is not ror you. If this review helped you please click helpful button below, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marie N.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice for the money. Love that it has wine glass holders. It's pretty sturdy and can hold a decent amount of weight on top for other alcohol or beverages. Be careful not to shake it too much as wine bottles can and will eventually fall but it takes a decent amount of movement depending on the bottle. I modified mine to have rubber grips where the bottles sit to create some traction on the wood. They move way less and everything feels much sturdier now so in case a dog or child bump it the wine shouldn't move much. Otherwise fantastic product. About as good as your going to get for something premade at this price point. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Amodei

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is fairly easy to assemble. Took me about 15-20 min from the unboxing to the finished product. The material feels strong. Once put together it is a bit wobbly. I’m hoping once I get my wine on it, it will add some weight to make it sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I got the rack for my wife. I looked through the different racks on Amazon. I was looking for sturdiness as well as the ability of holding wine glasses. My wife has a lot of glasses that take up a lot of cupboard space. I will note that the wood was manufactured and, thus, very heavy. This was acceptable to me as I was favoring sturdiness and the ability to hold a good number of bottles. I had all of the parts and didn't find any glaring imperfections. My wife loved it. She liked the fact that the look was very pretty and matches our furniture. I do recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. It should've been priced $20 cheaper...but hey. Set up was easy. I'm not the handy type. I realized I have a lot of non conventional shaped bottles that I had to place on top. If you have thick stem margarita glasses, they will not fit. Well guess I should start drinking to empty some of the bottles...lol. You know, get rid of the clutter 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kemmy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it tonight and I love it. I live alone in an upstairs apartment and was able to carry the box upstairs with no help. The only thing I've ever put together besides this was a cat condo and this was so much easier than that! Assembly is very simple. And it looks great absolutely no complaints. I would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Kay Summer

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Seriously--EASY to assemble and GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY to assemble! No tools needed, really. There's a hex key included that fits the heads on the screws. In 15 minutes, even I had it put together properly and stocked with the wine that, as luck would have it, arrived on the same day. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: TIM Talks Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great size and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy. After searching for bakers racks with wine glass/bottle storage and table top wine racks, I stumbled upon this. It was well made, holds glasses and bottle and it fit snuggly where I wanted to place it. It was much better in person than I expected and the price was right. It has a lovely espresso finish and pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cmhwolfe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this wine rack. Assembly was easy and the final product is nicer then I had hoped for. It’s sturdy, and absolutely beautiful. I highly recommend it. Can’t beat the price either! Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Karacsony

customer_reviews.title: Unclear directions for assembly!
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack comes with confusing directions. The illustrations are poor as it is impossible to determine dimension and depth on a one-dimensional drawing. The instructions should have more explicit wording to prevent mistakes. As a result, the wine rack ended up being put together backwards and cannot be taken apart as the wooden rivets have were pounded in and cannot come out without damaging the wine rack. It is my suggestion to go to a department store and purchase one already assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Wine Rack !
customer_reviews.text: As someone who just started drinking wine, after collecting a few bottles, I realized having them sitting on the counter wasn't all that attractive. So I looked on Amazon and found this product. It was affordable, and also had hanging slots for my wine glasses. I was pleased with the quality and durability of the product. If you've built a piece of furniture from IKEA, then you have all the skills required to assemble this wine rack. Ended up fitting really nicely near my kitchen counter and the dark wood seems (to me) more appropriate than a light colored wood to hold wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Uehara

customer_reviews.title: Four screws were stripped and two of the wood pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Four screws were stripped and two of the wood pieces that hold the glasses were nearly falling off they were so loose. Each buyer needs to know this is a cheaply made piece.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together which was pretty easy to do. Couple of things I noticed: 1-one of the legs was loose and when I tried to tighten the screw, it was stripped(picture 1) 2- most of the parts have visible scratches that were painted over. Their sanding job is not good enough(picture 2) Over all it's a decent wine rack for the 76 bucks I paid, feels sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jbast

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: To give you an Indra of how easy it is to put together, I am drunk and was drunk while I put it together in under 30 minutes of opening. It came with no instructions. If you can’t figure this out I think you have bigger problems to worry about
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few months ago. At first, I was a little disappointed because there were a few cracks in the wood that had obviously been glued over in the factory. I decided to keep it as it was too big of a pain in the ass to ship back. It has had heavy use for the last 4 months and so far has been great. No complaints. I really like how everything fits and how sturdy it is. Definitely​ worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brent U

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on wayfair for $115. Got it delivered for about $62. Easy assembly and quite sturdy—I have 24 bottles on it and there is decent room for reasonably sized wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: C2BleeV

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, is great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, is great quality. However, came with a missing piece: top, back wood rack piece. Am sending "missing piece" form today. Hopefully will receive good service and can complete the rack soon. If this occurs, will give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamille

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Totally cute wine rack. Putting it together was a wee bit challenging as it didn’t come with instructions but I figured out. Holds a lot of bottles and glasses. Just what I was looking for and can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: It's great and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, I've been using it for a few days now and so far it's great, I'll edit my review in a few months after I see how steady it is.
customer_reviews.author: Laub

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is great for the price. Came very nicely packaged and was not hard to assemble at all! Easily holds all 24 bottles and 12 glasses (standard size). I got it as a gift for my mom and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Function and beauty all in one design
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the espresso finish which is very dark brown, almost black. The rack was very easy to assemble. The wine bottles are very secure in the rack and it is designed to tip a bit so the wine keeps the cork wet. I also enjoy the wine glass holders at the top area of the rack. You have everything you need in one area. The shelf on the top is also very convenient for holding other supplies. It looks beautiful in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: RKBo

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice enough little table
customer_reviews.text: well, it's a nice enough little table, but be sure you measure how long the stems of your wine glasses are - mine didn't fit. it holds snifters ok, but even my martini glasses were too long. it's not the sturdiest table, a little wobbly. would not order it again, but won't return it either.
customer_reviews.author: maryc

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rack for about a year now and couldn't be happier. I was looking for something decent but didn't want to spend a ton of money. Took a bit longer than expected to assemble and was NOT easy to do alone, but I am very happy with the end product. It has held all of my wine with absolutely no issues since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kory P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price! Easy assembly! Won't fit larger red wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the cost! Wonderful addition to our sitting room. Like many other reviews, I was sad that my bigger red wine glasses didn't fit. They aren't the giant ones, they are just the red wine and pinot noir Riedel glasses. Like one reviewer we drilled our own holes and just moved it out on the ends. Pretty easy to do, but a little annoying. Overall this is a fabulous addition and looks much more expensive than it actually is. Very easy to assemble! I liked it so much I actually bought it as a house warming present for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Weaver

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It was a present for my wife who is a wine lover. It's really nice looking, holds a good amount of bottles. We're very happy with this thing. Awesome price too
customer_reviews.author: SirIronBeard

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job well
customer_reviews.text: The rack is very sturdy and the stem glass holders on top are a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to set up and looks incredibly nice. It’s very high quality and I 10/10 recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: We have the light colored wood version of this in one area of the house, but needed a second to hold our ever-expanding collection. We needed the dark wood for the other room and this is beautiful. We have some wine glasses with bases that are 3" and they don't fit - we had to purchase a second solution for those glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Gwenifer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: My 14yr old son was able to put this together in 10mins flat. It came when it was supposed to and is perfect for the space I intended.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Received the package on time and in good condition. They recommend two people to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the package on time and in good condition. They recommend two people to put together and I am sure that would have been a bit easier but I got in done in just over 30 minutes. It fits perfectly in my Condo and holds my wine glasses and my wine bottles. The table on top is sturdy and big enough to hold my decanter set and glasses. It is vintage so I am happy to finally have a place to display it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW!! This is beautiful!! I don't understand why other reviews say it was hard to put together. I managed to do it alone in under 30 min (with carpel tunnel syndrome!) This item looks stunning in my dinning room and I've received one compliment after another on it! I definitely recommend this items to anyone who wants a lovely, elegant wine rack to show off their bottles. The wood is a rich dark cherry wood color that compliments any decor.
customer_reviews.author: RayvenMoonlight

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra storage for my more expensive bottles, but didn't want to spend a fortune. This was a very good deal at $75, and does the trick very nicely. Its easy to assemble and the wood is a nice dark color. My only issue, and the reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is that the slots for the glasses are too narrow for most of my wine glasses. I may take it apart and re-do the slats at some point, but for now I'll leave them empty.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M

customer_reviews.title: Beverage Center
customer_reviews.text: It is really great for a small area, and looks very nice. We use it for our beverage center, we put other bottles on top, such as liquor and soda. It will hold other bottles of liquor also. Would recommend this. I would order it again if we need to for new bottles of wine as we collect.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Beckley

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggested
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present or my fiancee 2 years ago and I put some LED lights on the back and filled it with 24 bottles and its beautiful! It has held together through moving houses and countless parties. Highly suggested!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine rack, at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great wine rack and bar table. Sting and study and looks great too. Easy to assemble without much instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the photo fool you!
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is very nice and is much better in real life than what shows in the photo. The photo does not give proper perspective on size. We were plesantly surprised to fine the top is quite large and has plenty of room to set accessories and bar tools. It is tricky to put together but once together is very sturdy and strong. Though made for wine storage we keep other alcohol bottles stored here also. at this price point it is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: I like the bartender...my bf/bff!
customer_reviews.text: live in an apt so the size of this bar is perfect for us. assembly was quick and easy. it's put to good use! 😜 we have a bottle on almost every rung and more on top. it's holding up (over a year now) no signs of ware. great price for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for my house, love the color and the wood is great, easy to put together, small in space but hold a good amounts of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: esther zelaya

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive my shipment today that I stopped the maillady to get my stuff. Set up was pretty easy. However, should improve the picture because I had the bars on wrong and didn't notice it until I had all legs screwed in. Didn't take long to unscrew and flip to correct side. Took no more than 20mins (at max) to put together. Like how it hold different size bottles. A plus why I got this and not other ones. Think I might have to get another just for my hard liquor. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice even finish.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice finish. A great addition to our dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine rack at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wine rack at a very nice price. It is sturdy and holds a lot of bottles. It is bigger than I thought it would be. But it is a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it's together, but the instructions are not clear
customer_reviews.text: The instructions start with information on how to attach the rack to the wall with studfinders, but no instructions otherwise on how to put it together. Once you figure it out, it's a sturdy rack that looks nice in the room, but that first bit is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered to me twice. It was IMPOSSIBLE to assemble and then after i did i noticed that the entire thing was scratched!!! After the sent me the second one it was scratched worse than the first! I couldn't get it back in the boxes and they refunded me my money. I just donated it to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Refoel Levin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great wine rack, sturdy and nice. Girl loves it and it holds alot of wine. Not super small and has a nice flat top for a surface to put things on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a small price!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great piece of furniture not only for the price but the quality is excellent! It was easy to assemble, it's solid and the looks great! We're impressed and pleased with the wine rack.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today , absolutely no hardware included and no way to contact the manufacture . Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this wine rack. It added the perfect touch to my living room. The color is a deep brown. Close to brown-black. If light is hitting it, it is more brownish tone with hints of burgandy.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, holds lots of wine
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, holds lots of wine, including big bottles (at least on the top shelf). It was easy to put together and to load with wine and glasses. I wish it was a little taller and deeper so there'd be more room for glasses and large bottles but overall we're very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly, packed well, and easy to put together. I feel really good about the value I received with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hickox

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: We were able to make due since the broken piece was not crucial. Otherwise, look nice and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I love the color and it is super cute. Only downfall is the wood is not very hard so it can be easy to dent, scratch or break if not careful. Overall recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged with large scratches all over. Looks like I've had it for 10 years when it just arrived today.
customer_reviews.author: TianTian

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolts in....
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy once all together. Also the bolts might be hard to locate. They're in a brown little bag,looks like it could be part of the packing/wrapping stuffing(I almost tossed it out,so be careful and check).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, got it full of bottles and it looks great, Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Enke

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and it’s sturdy, looks great filled !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the area in my kitchen and hold many bottles and looks sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna M. Curatalo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The install wasn't too bad and the stand looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great design, a little complex assembling steps but I made it work. Just need the wine now to fill it up!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Raust

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love love this ! Very durable & looks more expensive than what I paid. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Page

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not satisfied with the color !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice item , but totally a problem with the color , supposed to be espresso brown finish, but this wine rack is definitely a cherry wood color ☹️😡🤯🤬will be returning it to Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wine Rack!
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks way more expensive than the price paid. It was easy to assemble and wine/champagne bottles fit perfectly. I had no problem putting my wine glasses in the slots as well as champagne glasses. Most of my wine glasses are from wine tasting but they fit perfect. I think only the very large ones would not fit. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this wine rack. It was very easy to put together and is very sturdy. The table top looks smaller in some of the photos but it is decent size. Have gotten a ton of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Warstler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, solid wood and great price. Excellent packaging,not so much as a tiny scratch. After assembly, very solid. Would by again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rknee46

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I seriously LOVE this!!!! Easy to assemble, very strong. Just the perfect wine station!!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaNiccole  Glennon

customer_reviews.title: A good piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice rack. It was easily assembled, sturdy and makes is an excellent addition to our other wine storage facilities. There was 1 defective part. I advised the manufacturer via the form included and promptly received the appropriate replacement part.. Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Best looking wine rack on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Get so many compliments on this wine rack. Owned the same one when I lived across the country. Loved it so much that I bought it again after I moved!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Marinara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! It is sturdy and the wine glass slots are perfect! We are in a small apartment, and space is limited. I used it to sit under our bar that we do not utilize as a "bar" to sit at. It worked perfectly! Easy to assemble, no issues with the instructions. It is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Creative_Native

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to hold wine bottles but is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: After constructing... it is a little wobbly. Added a small brace and it stands strong now. Loaded with wine bottles and liquor on top and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for price paid
customer_reviews.text: I paid $49 for this and think it is great value in that it is easy to set up, looks great, and does it's job. I have seen it sell for considerably more. In my opinion, do not spend much more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: love it, just as description says works great in the small area I needed it to
customer_reviews.author: Georgetta Branstetter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why so many complain about it being difficult to put together. I'm a 45 year-old woman with hands that don't always work as well as they once did. I had it unboxed and put together in about 20 minutes by myself. I'd have given it 4 stars, but it had a large blemish on the top of it. I'm disappointed about that, but mostly satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jvb

customer_reviews.title: Great for wine lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I actually (by mistake) assembled this backwards, but I like it more this way! I can read all the labels on the wines from the front, instead of turning my head around! It’s pretty and practical!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great place to display my wine bottles and glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this item to whoever needs a wine rack for a small area. I love it. Doesn’t look cheap and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I got this wine rack because I wanted something more stylish than the ones I had and this definitely is! It was a little bit of a pain to put together but it took me maybe about 30 minutes total. It's not impossible, just a little frustrating. I also had the top on the wrong way at first and after I switched it the correct way, the top seemed to wobble a tiny bit but it is still an incredibly sturdy piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Handsome wine rack
customer_reviews.text: High quality espresso finish, looks great in my dining room. I have extra-big stemmed glasses that are a bit of a tight fit in the hangers, but I can still fit all I need. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble - you have to very carefully fit all the jigsaw pieces together and when one part fits, the other slips out. Product was missing all screws and the Hex wrench.
customer_reviews.author: E. Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Nice Looking Piece
customer_reviews.text: This went together pretty easily, and the quality is satisfactory. It looks good too. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kottke

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, it was delivered promptly on time and I was able to assemble it myself in about 30 minutes. Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Simple wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews about it not being study but it’s holding up fine so far. If it tips over or breaks, I’ll come back and edit this but it’s fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Krisy92

customer_reviews.title: Very nice... one thing i would change
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice rack. It came extremely well wrapped... someone took great care to make sure it arrived well. I like it a lot just one thing i would change. The slide racks for the glasses only fit certain size glasses. I would imagine it would be hard to fit everything but maybe make some of them like they are and some a little larger so you can hold a little better variety of glasses. My tall ones don't fit. Not a huge deal for me but it would have been nice if more fit. That is why i gave it 4 stars. Very nice hardwood piece.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the money, don’t be afraid to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the look of this wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of this wine rack. It was fairly easy to put together and makes a nice addition. It holds plenty of wine bottles and up to 18 different wine glasses (white, red, Champagne, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wohl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the ease in which it was put together. It was made sturdier by adding wood clue to the shelf inserts. We had to drill holes for the upper back piece in the back board. We received two of the same main frame sides pieces and it was easier to drill holes then the hassle of the repacking and sending back. It could have been an issue if we didn't have the tools needed to fix. Shipment arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K.D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: It holds glasses well, and plenty of em; has space on top for my hard A canister and shot glasses. Pretty sturdy. I love the black; fits well with the room I have it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great little wine rack.. especially for the price. Looks really nice and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Audra H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, sturdy, all glasses fit well - just a wee bit wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, appears to very sturdy, was relatively easy to assemble, and I had no issue fitting my wine glasses and bottles on the rack. My only complaint is it is a little wobbly - I had to put some cardboard under one of the feet to keep it from rocking about.
customer_reviews.author: J. Darcy

customer_reviews.title: awesome for price
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is awesome for the price. The only thing I wish it had was a drawer but it works perfectly for what I needed. It holds 18 of our small stemware set (from bed bath and beyond, brand: luminarc) and is beautiful. On top it holds our toaster oven and a large plant, and doesn't look crowded. Also holds bottles nicely and holds skinny bottles as well as large. Great buy and looks much more expensive than listed price!
customer_reviews.author: Emily and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed and Stable - Solid Wood
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and stable. Great workmanship (is made out of wood, not particle board) easy to assemble. Only issue is if a wine glass base is shaped with a thicker base, will not work in rack (have only found one glass that I cannot get into it out of the 10+ glasses I have)
customer_reviews.author: Shadowbrooke

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Vinny Wine Rack, 24 Bottle with Glass Hanger
customer_reviews.text: I gave my husband this gift for Christmas - not only he loves it, I love it, too! perfect for what he needs! not only functional but lovely complement to our home :) Got our money's worth for it! we can surely recommend this to anybody having at least 24 different kinds of wine at the same time :) Prior to choosing this wine rack, I have been to several stores to check out wine racks, did not find any that suits the look, functionality and the budget! a really great deal.... thanks, Amazon! :)
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Very well made wine rack and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend that two people assemble it. It is somewhat awkward fo one to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Libby

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking, handy wine rack but there are some cracks on the top and the holes of both sides are not even ( one is lower than the other) which makes the racks look uneven after being assembled. Small part but ruins a big picture. Also keep in mind the pinot glasses won't fit in those glass hangers. Just glasses with smaller base.
customer_reviews.author: Sienasilver

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you pay for .. parts did not have letters to go buy, but pretty simple to assemble .
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Not to big or small
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my sister she said it is the perfect size for a small space everything you need in one place table top wine glass holder and wine perfect amount wine holder
customer_reviews.author: In Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this wine rack and received it within 3 days. Putting it together was a breeze and i'm not that good with putting together furniture. Once together, it was very sturdy and wasn't wobbling. Since I have big wine glasss, i had to put the wine on the second rack and work down but that's not a problem. The wine rack looks great and blends i well with my living room furniture. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: LER7559

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this wine rack with glass hanger! less clutter and a beautiful addition to the dining room. It took me about an hour to assemble it (very easy) and it fits lots of bottles. It looks grand and it's great for the price! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HutchFam

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed to see that this was missing a "narrow" frame and had an extra "wide" frame. Whoever packed this did a crappy job. I'm getting jaded with buying furniture online... Other than that, the product looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: LawDawg101

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack.
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be very sturdy. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Looney

product_meta.title: Winsome Vinny Wine Storage, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoThe Winsome Wood vinny 24-bottle wine rack lets you store your favourite wine bottles as well as other spirits, a perfect addition to any home. A great piece for your dining or living room area. With space for 24 bottles of wine, you can have one or more of your favourite varieties on hand to serve during each meal or while entertaining family and guests. This rack has 6 slots to accommodate 0. 75L wine bottles on each rack with a weight capacity of 25lbs per rack. There are six rows of glassware holders, allowing you to hang 18-24 wine glasses depending on the diameter. The top has a surface of 31. 5in W x 16. 22in D, great for displaying or can be used as a serving table. Constructed of solid wood to provide durability and sturdiness for long lasting durability. Finished in a rich espresso, this design can fit in with most styles of home decor. Conveniently ships in 1 box and ready for assembly. Replacement parts can be requested directly to the manufacturer within 60 days from date of purchase. Unit dimensions: 31. 5in W x 16. 22in D x 35. 67in H
feature_bullets: Overall wine rack size is 31. 5"W x 16. 2"D x 35. 6"H. Top surface area of 31. 5"W x 16. 2"D.
Store 24 - 1 liter wine bottles on this rack and up to 24 slim wine glasses.
Crafted from solid wood in Black Finish. Assembly required.
